Api for Hotel Booking Remaining (13 *2 = 26 working Days)
================================
1 > AvailableHotelRooms()       		
2 > HotelCancellationPolicies()
3 > HotelSearchWithRooms()
4 > HotelCancellationPolicyForAllRooms()
5 > Booking 
6 > AvailabilityAndPricing()
7 > HotelBook()
8 > GenerateInvoice() 
9 > HotelBookingDetail() 
10 > HotelBookingDetailBasedOnDate()
12 > HotelCancel() 
13 > Cancellation flow and cancellation status 

Packages ( 8 to 10 Days Approx)
--------------------
1> Package 					-> 3 Days
2> Package Details				-> 3 Days
3> Package Booking				-> 2 Days

Travel Offer (5 Days Approx)
--------------------
1> Offer					-> 5 Day

=============================================================================
Only For Programatically Approx 40 Working Days (Min 40*8=320 Hours).
